column2: data %>% mutate(placeID = as.factor(placeID), rating=as.factor(rating)) %>% group_by(placeID) %>% add_tally() %>% ungroup() %>% ggplot(aes(x=reorder(placeID, -n),fill=rating))+ geom_bar(stat="count", color="#686256") + theme(axis.title.x=element_blank(),axis.text.x=element_blank(),axis.ticks.x=element_blank())+labs(title="Restaurant Rating Counts") + scale_fill_manual(values=c("#f0efef", "#e4d1d1", "#b9b0b0"))
